# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security issue in this project, please report it responsibly by opening an issue or contacting the maintainer directly.

- **Email:** hamzakargin@outlook.com
- **GitHub Issues:** https://github.com/hamzakargin/Mynthra/issues

## Supported Versions

We actively maintain the latest release of the Mynthra Theme.  
Please ensure your report is for a supported version.
